KAITO pulling back on BingX today feels less like panic and more like a reality check for InfoFi narratives. With X tightening rewards, a lot of InfoFi tokens are being forced to prove they can stand on utility, not incentives. KAITO‚Äôs dip looks tied to that shift with attention farming vs sustainable value. I‚Äôve traded similar cycles where price deflates first, then stabilizes once expectations reset. Interestingly, broader majors like SOL stayed relatively firm over the same window, suggesting this move is sector-specific, not market-wide. For me, this is a moment to observe structure and user demand, not rush conclusions.

$SOL showed strong momentum today with a sharp push higher, another sign that risk appetite is creeping back into the market. Riding that wave,  $FOGO  delivered a pretty clean, textbook Day 1 performance. 

After launching across multiple CEXs,  $FOGO surged quickly into the $0.06- $0.07 zone before cooling off toward ~$0.04 area, right on cue with airdrop claims and classic sell the news pressure. 

Volume has been healthy, futures OI is steadily building, and the tech side is actually holding up well. Early swaps stayed smooth, with SVM and Firedancer keeping TPS high despite the initial rush.

I‚Äôm trading both spot and futures on #BingX to compete for the $50K #FOGO  rewards. The L1 space is crowded, but this one is already showing it can handle real load, now it‚Äôs about whether apps and traders keep showing up.

THE SLEEPING GIANT: ALTCOINS/BTC MACRO VIEW

                        "ALTCOIN DOMINANCE"

Take your eyes off the hourly charts. Look at the bigger picture.

Before you is the Others/BTC Monthly (1M) Chart. 

This is not ETH, XRP or SOL. This is the market's ‚Äòrest‚Äô. This chart is the purest form of ‚ÄòRisk Appetite üí•‚Äô

The massive structure you see on the chart (Accumulation/Compression) has been ongoing for years. Historically, whenever this chart breaks above this compression, ‚ÄòLogic‚Äô is suspended in the market and ‚ÄòMadness‚Äô (Euphoria) begins.  (Altseason)
(See: end of 2017, beginning of 2021).

We are currently on the brink of that breakout. It hasn't started yet. Once it does, you won't be able to stop the train.

The market is a ‚ÄòCapital Transfer‚Äô mechanism. Money first flows into Bitcoin (Safe Haven). Then it moves to Ethereum. Finally, it ends up here: Others/BTC

The smaller players, crushed under years of ‚ÄòBitcoin Dominance‚Äô pressure, are nearing the completion of their bottom formation. When this chart lifts its head, it will confirm that this ‚ÄòSmart Money‚Äô has taken profits from Bitcoin and moved into the most speculative assets.

This is the fastest and most dangerous part of the cycle (FOMO/Hype). We are not there yet.

Are you trusting the data or fear‚ùì
